Class GameSystem

java.lang.Object
GameSystem
public class GameSystem extends Object
This class contains the game's logic and entire game process. Tools, Crops, Player Information, and other details are stored and processed here. Is also able to display via console the logic of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameSystem

      public GameSystem(int[] status)
      Constructor of the class GameSystem. Creates a new game, which creates a farm, a farmer, sets the day to 1, and creates a copy of all the available crops and tools' information.
      Parameters:
      status - an array which determines if a tile has a rock or not

  • Method Details

    • generateSeed

      public Crop generateSeed(char id)
      Generates a new Crop seed.
      Parameters:
      id - the crop's id.
      Returns:
      new seed is given id matches any of the crop ids, null if not.

    • getTool

      public Tool getTool(char id)
      Gets a Tool according to the specified id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the tool that is being selected
      Returns:
      tool that contains the tool id, null if is not applicable

    • treePlantable

      public boolean treePlantable(int row, int col)
      Checks if tree can be planted on the given tile.
      Parameters:
      row - the selected tile's row.
      col - the selected tile's column.
      Returns:
      if tree is plantable in tile or not.
